column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Korra says : " That 's one of the saddest stories I 've ever heard . "
#Text=Tarrlok says : " Avatar Korra .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " When he took my bending , the sensation was somehow familiar .
#Text=I later recognized it as my brother 's bloodbending grip .
#Text=" Korra says : " So , he somehow uses bloodbending to take people 's bending .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " I do n't know how he does it , but then again , I 've never encountered a bender as strong as Noatak .
#Text=" Korra says : " How in the world do we beat him ?
#Text=" Mako says : " We ca n't .
#Text=Any attack we throw at him , he 'll redirect with his mind .
#Text=That 's how he 's been able to challenge any bender .
#Text=" Korra says : " So much for our ambush .
#Text=If we stay here , we 're toast .
#Text=But there 's another way to beat him .
#Text=" Mako says : " How ?
#Text=" Korra says : " This whole time , Amon has been one step ahead of us .
#Text=But finally we have the advantage .
#Text=We know the truth about him .
#Text=If we expose him as a bender in front of all his supporters ... " Mako says : " At the rally .
#Text=" Korra says : " ... We could take away his true power !
#Text=" Mako says : " And undermine this whole revolution !
#Text=" Korra says : " Thank you , for your help .
#Text=We ca n't just leave him here .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " Go .
#Text=Amon ca n't know anyone spoke with me .
#Text=Defeat him .
#Text=Put an end to this sad story .

#Text=" Main Asami Sato Bolin General Iroh Korra Mako Antagonists Equalists Hiroshi Sato Lieutenant Noatak ( Amon ) Protester Yakone ( flashback only ) says : " Minor Gommu Naga Pabu Tarrlok White Lotus sentries Yakone 's wife ( flashback only ) " Shiro Shinobi says : " Airbenders are mysteriously disappearing in Ba Sing Se , including Kai .
#Text=The Earth Queen denied any knowledge of the airbenders , but Korra refuse to give up her search .
#Text=Meanwhile , Mako and Bolin met their long lost relatives , who told them that Dai Li agents have been rounding up airbenders for the queen 's army .
#Text=And at a prison in the north , Tonraq and Lord Zuko prepare for Zaheer 's imminent attack .
#Text="
